definition: to make friends with
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: You need to build a business, not to make new friends on-line.
sentences.chinese: 你需要建立一个生意，不结交新朋在网上。

sentences.english: He liked most animals stamps, he likes to make friends with like-minded friends.
sentences.chinese: 他最喜欢动物邮票，他喜欢结交情趣相投朋友。

sentences.english: With softness and strength, i would like to make more friends.
sentences.chinese: 我刚柔并济，活泼大方，愿意结交更多的朋友。

sentences.english: It is every renju players right and free choice to make friends.
sentences.chinese: 每个棋手都有权力自由地选择结交棋友。

sentences.english: If you get out more you can meet more new friends.
sentences.chinese: 如果你更加经常外出，你就会结交到更多的朋友。

sentences.english: In addition, you can try to write English diaries and even make foreign penpals by writing those.
sentences.chinese: 此外，你可以尝试用英文写日记，甚至结交外国笔友。

sentences.english: Seek the fellowship of godly men, harken unto their words and remember them.
sentences.chinese: 与虔诚之人结交，倾听其话语并铭记在心。

sentences.english: Avoid malcontents and pessimists. They dray you down and contribute nothing.
sentences.chinese: 避免结交不满意者和悲观者，他们对你有害无益。

sentences.english: Henry made many friends among the residents and staff at St Dunstan's.
sentences.chinese: 在圣邓斯坦，亨利结交了许多当地的朋友。

sentences.english: Now Dauren has a lot of friends and soul mates.
sentences.chinese: 如今Dauren结交了很多朋友和灵魂伴侣。

sentences.english: Making new friends and communication with interesting people are the best ways to fight boredom.
sentences.chinese: 结交新朋友的最好方法是无聊时与有趣的人通信。

sentences.english: Do they really think that America is going to think that Barack Obama is palling around with terrorists?
sentences.chinese: 他们真的认为美国人会相信奥巴马在结交恐怖分子么？

sentences.english: Hehe. Just want to make friends in my free time.
sentences.chinese: 男女皆可，只是纯粹想结交仪征的朋友。

sentences.english: Money can buy a lot of influence.
sentences.chinese: 金钱可结交许多达官贵人。

sentences.english: Avoid malcontents and pessimists. They drag you down and contribute nothing.
sentences.chinese: 避免结交不满意者和悲观者，他们对你有害无益。

sentences.english: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or keep one.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要为了结交朋友或者挽留友情而做错一事。

definition: to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
to make friends/(dialect) to start an affair with sb
congenial
to have friendly relationships/circle of friends
to make friends/to form friendship
to associate with/to mix with/to connect
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
communication/social intercourse
very friendly/intimate
to be able to talk to/to get along with/to be congenial
best friend
intimate friend
to associate (with)/to have contact (with)/to hang out (with)/to date/(interpersonal) relationship/association/contact
contacts/connections/network
old friend
nodding acquaintance/slight familiarity
